participant_2.background:
I enjoy creating beautiful wedding cakes for people to enjoy on their special day.
I like to go to YouTube to watch funny videos with my nephews.
I was a personal chef before I started my own meatloaf catering business.

my favorite author is stephen king.

content.text: What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to create beautiful wedding cakes for people to enjoy on their special day.
Wow, that is so cool! I wish I had that kind of talent.
Thank you! It takes a lot of time and effort, but it is worth it to see the finished product.
I'm sure it is! I love seeing the pictures of wedding cakes on Instagram.
Me too! It's always so inspiring to see what other people are creating.
What's your favorite type of wedding cake to make?
I love making all types of wedding cakes, but my favorite is probably the classic white cake with buttercream frosting.
That sounds delicious! I bet it tastes even better than it looks.
It does! I love making cakes for people's special days. It's so much fun to be a part of their celebration.
I'm sure it is! I'm glad you have such a rewarding job.
